title: Effective Leader Program (Feb-Apr-May 2016)
desc: Frontier Associates? Effective Leader Program   ? Communications Workshop: Mon-Tue, Feb 29, Mar 1, 2016   Management Workshop: Mon-Tue, April 4-5, 2016   Leadership Workshop: Mon-Tue, May 2-3, 2016   plus 3 hours of 1-1 telephone coaching   Frontier Associates?  Effective Leader Program  (ELP) enables people to lead others in producing measurable results that  dramatically   exceed  past performance or expectations ? accomplishing breakthroughs that surpass what might seem possible. The Effective Leader Program introduces  unique ways of thinking about and implementing communication, leadership, management, teamwork, meetings, problem solving, and generating buy-in, giving participants a reliable process for producing breakthrough results with others. More than 90% of graduates report the program was tremendously valuable, and recommend it to their? colleagues. Note: Cancellations less than two weeks prior to the first day of a Workshop require a $100 rescheduling fee to cover the cost of unused materials and food (which have to be ordered in advance). E-mail Ivan Rosenberg at irosenberg@frontier-assoc.com for more information.
